Perceptor::

"Thanks master"replied Percptor by comm link, after that he opened it 
(in that way that anyelse could heard) and said "Flicker, Do you 
copy??? Do you have something to report?" 



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> Flicker::
> 
> "Come on, come on, just a few more seconds ..." the bot in question 
> mutters under his breath as he toils away in the medbay.  He's 
> working on a device to paralyze a single transformer, which would 
> give him the perfect opporunity to use the same as a 
hostage.  "Done!"
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Perceptor::
> > 
> > "Master"said Perceptor by comm link by Galvatron (in a frecuency 
> that 
> > just Galvatron could receive)"I have an personal idea to prove a 
> > small teory that  could give us a advantage against our 
enemies... 
> > but I need your permission to have a commlink with Flicker..."
